description: Defines the 'iron-icon' web component for displaying icons, including styling, icon set management, and image fallback.

classes.name: iron-icon
classes.description: A custom element for displaying icons with support for icon sets and image fallback.

methods.name: _iconChanged
methods.description: Handles changes to the 'icon' property, parsing icon set and icon name.

methods.name: _srcChanged
methods.description: Handles changes to the 'src' property, updating the image source.

methods.name: _usesIconset
methods.description: Determines whether to use an icon set or a direct image source.

methods.name: _updateIcon
methods.description: Updates the displayed icon based on current properties, either from icon set or image source.
